description: This file is an HTML document that includes a script defining a Calculator class extending Service, which registers methods and communicates with a ServiceManager. It appears to be part of a web-based client or gateway interface for a remote service.

classes.name: Calculator
classes.description: A client-side class extending Service, providing 'add' and 'sub' methods that communicate with a remote service.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Calculates the sum of parameters and resolves a promise with the result.

methods.name: sub
methods.description: Calculates the difference between two parameters and resolves a promise with the result.
